Use site logo from SiteConfiguration in WLJ Assistant chat widget

- Update site_context processor to pull site_name, tagline, logo_url, and
  favicon_url from SiteConfiguration model instead of hardcoded values
- Update chat_widget.html to use site_logo_url with fallback to static logo
- Logo uploaded in Admin Console > Site Configuration now appears in chat header

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Add Cloudinary for persistent media storage

- Add cloudinary and django-cloudinary-storage packages

- Add fallback to local FileSystemStorage if Cloudinary not configured
- Requires CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME, CLOUDINARY_API_KEY, CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET env vars

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix medicine ''Taken Late'' status when medicine taken early

The mark_taken() method was comparing UTC-stored taken_at time against 
a naive local scheduled time, causing medicines taken BEFORE the 
scheduled time to be incorrectly marked as "Taken Late".

For example: 8:24 AM EST = 1:24 PM UTC. When stripped of timezone, 
"1:24 PM" > "10:00 AM" (scheduled + grace), so marked as late.

Fixed by converting taken_at to user''s local timezone before comparing.
Also fixed was_on_time and minutes_late properties with same issue.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Merge affectionate-shaw: Fix medicine ''Taken Late'' status timezone bug

Fix for medicines taken BEFORE the scheduled time being incorrectly
marked as "Taken Late". The mark_taken() method was comparing
UTC-stored taken_at against a naive local scheduled time.

- Fixed mark_taken() to convert taken_at to user''s local timezone
- Fixed was_on_time property with same timezone handling
- Fixed minutes_late property with same timezone handling
- Updated release note description

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
AI Span: Enhance AI context with comprehensive user data

Life: Projects, tasks due, overdue items, calendar events

Dashboard AI generates truly personalized messages based on full picture.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Twilio Error 21212 - Add phone number validation and normalization

Problem: SMS sends were failing with Twilio Error 21212 (Invalid ''From'' number)
because TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER wasn''t validated or normalized to E.164 format.

Solution:
- Added _normalize_phone_number() to TwilioService that:
  - Removes formatting chars (spaces, dashes, parens, dots)
  - Adds +1 prefix for 10-digit US numbers
  - Validates against E.164 regex pattern
- Phone normalization at service init AND for destination numbers
- Detailed error logging showing From/To values on failures
- Specific error messages for Twilio 21212/21211 errors

Files modified:
- apps/sms/services.py - Phone normalization and error handling
- apps/sms/tests/test_sms_comprehensive.py - 6 new tests (46 total)
- docs/wlj_claude_changelog.md - Documented fix
- docs/wlj_claude_features.md - Added Phone Number Normalization section

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
